entry.title: Liberland, A Micronation, Elects Justin Sun As Prime Minister Via Blockchain Voting
entry.summary:
The founder of TRON and a well-known figure in the blockchain industry, Justin Sun, has taken his talents into politics as he has been elected as the prime minister of the Free Republic of Liberland, a nation situated between Croatia and Serbia.
Liberland was founded in 2015 by Czech politician V√≠t Jedliƒçka on a seven-square-kilometer stretch of disputed land. The goal of this new sovereign entity is to become a libertarian society where personal and economic freedoms thrive, with minimal government intervention. Although Liberland is not officially recognized by the United Nations, this is still a groundbreaking move as Sun‚Äôs appointment is seen as a huge step in the small nation‚Äôs global profile.
TRON founder Justin Sun named prime minister of Liberland

entry.title: Binance CEO Richard Teng Talks Progress on Exchange's Global Regulatory Goals
entry.summary: Decrypt Reporters Sander Lutz and Liz Napolitano spoke with Binance CEO Richard Teng about the crypto exchange's progress on establishing a global headquarters, improving its relationships with regulators, and expanding its global presence in the wake of founder Changpeng "CZ" Zhao's jailing in the U.S.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 207 - WELCOME BACK TO THE BULL!
entry.summary: Kamala signals support for crypto. Top memecoins all soar, add $10bn in value in a week. MOODENG hits $180m, does 11x in a week. SUI & SEI continue to lead L1s for price & TVL growth. Revolut & Robinhood are considering stablecoin. Visa launches new tokenisation platform for banks. PayPal to allow business accounts to hold crypto Hamster kombat's HMSTER disappoints on launch. Biden admin may have forced Silvergate‚Äôs closure. Court rules crypto mining boxes ‚Äòare securities‚Äô.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 206 - MEMES ARE PUMPING!
entry.summary: BTC nears $65k key resistance level. Kamala makes positive comments about crypto. PayPal allows businesses to hold crypto. Visa allows banks to test RWAs & smart contracts. Cuban wants to be head of SEC. Silvergate claims about ‚ÄòChokepoint 2.0‚Äô grow. Truflation hacked for $5m. Telegram Wallet blocked in UK & US. Court rules crypto mining boxes are securities. Infinex DeFi platform raises $65m. Ethena announces new stablecoin linked to BUIDL.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 205 - ALTCOINS CONTINUE TO RALLY!
entry.summary: SUI leads L1 gains as TVL crosses $1bn. Altcoin market cap close to breaking downtrend. SEI becomes top chain for 1 month TVL growth. ETH ETFs sees 3rd largest inflow ever. SEC delays ETH ETF options decision. SOL took most of ETH outflows over last 3 months. SOLETH continues to be trading at resistance. $8.1bn BTC options to expire this week. BTC heading to $500k-$1m in a year: PlanB. Stablecoin supply hits new ATH. Caroline Ellison sentenced to 2 years in jail. SBF & Diddy in the same jail. SEC settles against TUSD for not being collateralised. Gensler gets derided for crypto approach. Hester Pierce admits flaws in SEC crypto policy. Harris against regulation by litigation: Cuban. Golem claims ETH move to CEXs due to staking. Binance refutes data leak claims. Next Y combinator batch has ‚Äòno crypto companies‚Äô. Celo overtakes Tron for stablecoin addresses.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 204 - MOODENG MOO-NING!
entry.summary: BTC needs to top $65.2k to put in a higher high. ETH ETFs see biggest outflow since July. ETH outperformance could be start of ‚Äòalt season‚Äô. BlackRock gets 12hr BTC withdrawal from Coinbase. cbBTC only wrapped BTC to not show reserves. Telegram to share user data upon legal requests. EIGEN non-transferability to be removed Sep 30th. TIA announces $100m funding round. TIA deal was OTC token sale ‚Äòdone months ago‚Äô. Polymarket considers token, trying $50m raise. Maybe we will pay off debt with crypto: Trump. Harris unlikely to give full crypto policy pre-election. 13m Binance users‚Äô data may have been leaked. Caroline Ellison likely won‚Äôt serve time in jail.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 203 - KAMALA GOES PRO-CRYPTO
entry.summary: Crypto funds saw $321m inflows last week. Kamala commits to crypto & AI expansion. TAO leads gains in AI hype, does 2x in 2 weeks. SUI TVL breaks $900m. Average Q4 returns for BTC is 88%. BTC Google searches down 75% since 2021. BTC 161 days from halving, when it rallied in 2020. Crypto VCs raised $2.2bn this year, well below 2021.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 202 - SOL STARTS TO SEND IT
entry.summary: SOL leads majors as Breakpoint begins. SOL launches Frankendancer on mainnet. Helio Pay allows Shopify items to sell on X. Franklin Templeton to launch fund on SOL. BTC short term holders fall at fastest rate in 12 years. MicroStrategy upsizes convertible note raise to $1bn. BingX loses $52m in hack. $243m crypto heist exposed by ZachXBT. Supreme Court of India hacked on X, shills scam. SocGen launches Euro stablecoin on SOL. Sky agrees to stop using WBTC. Germany shuts down 47 crypto exchanges. Stablecoin‚Äôs now 18th biggest holder of treasuries. Consensys lawsuit against SEC dismissed. Partisanship will stop Trump crypto plans: Hoskinson. Scaramucci working with Kamala on crypto.
